### Change or Jira reference

https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/DFPL-2818

### Justification for exclusion?

Needed to be able to run our master and preview pipelines

### Business area

CFT

### Team/Application Name

Family Public Law

### Environment

AAT / Staging, PTL, Preview / Dev

### Do you require a Bastion host to be powered on?

- [ ] Bastion host required?

### Skip shutdown start date

09-10-2025

### Skip shutdown end date

_No response_

### Do you need this exclusion past 11pm?

Yes

### Review date

10-10-2025
